title: ðŸš¨Raiders hire Josh McDaniels as head coach - Emergency Podcast (Football 1/30)
description:
As conferenceÂ championship weekend was about to kick off, NFL news dropped as the Raiders hired Josh McDaniels to be their next head coach. Just minutes away from the Bengals playing John Breech joined Will Brinson to break down the move for Las Vegas and what it means for the future of Derek Carr. The guys also discuss the impact on the Patriots and their new OC vacancy.Â 

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
